text: is all this and for the sins
and what are the high places
thereof shall be beaten to pieces
for they are gone into captivity
from which ye shall not remove
Therefore thou shalt have none that shall cast
to them that they shall not take
for this is not your rest
he shall even be the prophet
he shall even be the prophet
all of thee I will surely
all of thee I will surely
by reason of the multitude of men
Is it not for you to know
from off them and their flesh
from off them and they break
as they have behaved themselves ill
shall be unto you that ye shall not have a vision
unto you that ye shall not divine
this I pray you ye heads
it shall come to pass that the mountain
it shall come to pass that the mountain
and none shall make them afraid
and her that I have afflicted
and her that was cast far off
thee as a woman in travail
for now shalt thou go forth
and thou shalt beat in pieces
yet out of thee shall he come forth
unto me that is to be ruler
Therefore will he give them up
for now shall he be great
And this man shall be the peace
And it shall come to pass in that day
of thee and I will destroy
and thou shalt have no more soothsayers
of thee and thou shalt no more worship
of thee so will I destroy
such as they have not heard
unto thee and wherein have I wearied
Therefore also will I make thee sick
of thee and thou shalt take hold
is me! for I am as when they have gathered
of them is as a brier
is sharper than a thorn hedge
not against me O mine enemy
for me he will bring me forth
Then she that is mine enemy
unto me Where is the LORD
her now shall she be trodden down
